text: Davorlim is a census town and suburb of city of Margao in South Goa district in the state of Goa, India. ==Geography== Davorlim is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Davorlim It has an average elevation of 31 metres (102 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Davorlim had a population of 10,923. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Davorlim has an average literacy rate of 73%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 78% and, female literacy is 68%. In Davorlim, 12% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== == External links == Category:Cities and towns in South Goa district Category:Comunidades of Goa
title: Davorlim
